titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Joseph Estabrook papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Regent of the University of Michigan (1870-1878) and Michigan Superintendent of Public Instruction (1887-1891), teacher and Congregational minister in Ypsilanti, East Saginaw, and Olivet, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Certificates of election as Regent and as Superintendent of Public Instruction; also marriage licenses and certificates for marriages he performed.
